name: Caitie Moore
bio: Poet Caitie Moore is from Upstate New York where she grew up raising abandoned wild animals. She earned a BA at Prescott College and an MFA at the University of Montana. Her poetry engages her white femme subject position and can be found in her chapbook Wife (Argos Books, 2014), and in Brandon Shimoda's Ancients, No. Two and The Racial Imaginary: Writers on Race and the Life of the Mind (Fence Books, 2015).
